last_episode_to_air.name: Flower Child
last_episode_to_air.overview: Day 130.  Scouting in all directions, Danziger, Bess and Morgan come upon colorful flower buds which burst open throwing a golden powder in their faces.  The flower pollen carries a sickness that causes them to emit a golden vapor.

name: Earth 2
overview: Two centuries in the future, when pollution has forced humans to abandon Earth in favor of cramped space stations, scientist Devon Adair hijacks a spacecraft and sets out with a band of followers in search of another planet that will offer a brighter, more normal future to children like her son, Ulysses. Joining Devon and Ulysses are mechanic John Danziger and his daughter, True; team physician Julia Heller, who has her own secret agenda; Alonzo Solace, a pilot; Yale, a cyborg; and Morgan, a craven government agent, and his wife, Bess. The voyagers find their planet, but their ship crash-lands on the wrong side of the globe, forcing them to attempt an arduous and dangerous trek to their ultimate destination, New Pacifica.

episodes.name: First Contact (1)
episodes.overview: A new planet offers hope to Devon Adair's physically impaired son and others like him. Adair ignores government orders, assembles a crew and embarks on a journey to the unblemished planet 22 light years away.

episodes.name: First Contact (2)
episodes.overview: A new planet offers hope to Devon Adair's physically impaired son and others like him. Adair ignores government orders, assembles a crew and embarks on a journey to the unblemished planet 22 light years away.

episodes.name: The Man Who Fell to Earth (Two)
episodes.overview: Day 3. As the colonists begin their journey, John Danziger is the first to observe Gaal, who joins the group with the explanation that he was an astronaut explorer lost on the planet for years.

episodes.name: Life Lessons
episodes.overview: Two weeks on the planet. Gaal seeks True's friendship but reveals himself as an enemy. Gaal sees young True's lack of attention from the others and turns to her to achieve his evil goals.

episodes.name: Promises, Promises
episodes.overview: Alonzo Solace has often been visited by the Terrians through his dreams. This time it is a Terrian who needs the space pilot's help.

episodes.name: A Memory Play
episodes.overview: Three weeks on the planet.  As the pioneers who crossed the American west, the colonists of Earth 2 know they will encounter many dangers and now, memo flashbacks remind them of the Eden Advance spaceship's harrowing final moments in space.

episodes.name: Water
episodes.overview: With the Grendlers stealing reserves, the colonists must scan for bodies of much needed water. Danziger decides to head out in search of water and Devon insists on joining him.

episodes.name: The Church of Morgan
episodes.overview:
Day 38.  The marriage of Bess and Morgan is threatened. Julia sees Uly's arm sink into the earth and senses an unknown power in him.

Frightened he calls his mother, but in her presence the earth remains solid.

episodes.name: The Enemy Within
episodes.overview: Day 49.  Julie continues to experiment with Uly's DNA on orders from Reilly, but her duplicity is discovered by True who now has to convince the rest of the colonists.

episodes.name: Redemption
episodes.overview: Day 51.  Julia has been left behind and it weighs on the minds of all the colonists as they move across the harsh terrain. Only Alonzo turns back for her.

episodes.name: Moon Cross
episodes.overview: Day 61.  It is a chilly morning in the high desert as the group begins work. They think winter is their worst enemy but they are wrong.

episodes.name: Better Living Through Morganite (1)
episodes.overview: Day 66.  Morganite, a pulsating mineral that glows, causes a great amount of anguish for Yale and frightening problems for the others.

episodes.name: Better Living Through Morganite (2)
episodes.overview: Day 68.  At the biosphere, the petrifying geo-lock came within 100 meters of the camp. The colonists need the reversing code. Morgan attempts to reverse geo-lock before all is lost.

episodes.name: Grendlers in the Myst
episodes.overview: Day 72.  Seeking warm clothing, Danziger and other are tracking a fast-moving scavenger Grendler in wintry terrain when they come upon a fur-covered figure. The fleeing man wears a strange steel mask.

episodes.name: The Greatest Love Story Never Told
episodes.overview: Miles from nowhere, Danziger crosses the frozen tundra looking for food, severely unprotected from the harsh weather. Suddenly, a mysterious hooded figure appears.

episodes.name: Brave New Pacifica
episodes.overview: Inside a cave two eager Grendlers interact as they rummage through an insulated box marked ""Eden Project."" Brushing away spider webs, they see the words ""Human Blood"" printed on the side.

episodes.name: After the Thaw
episodes.overview: Day 109.  Danziger, Julia and Walman discover and excavate a Terrian corpse frozen in ice and completely preserved.  That night, both Alonzo and Morgan are confronted in their dreams by the unfrozen, half-decaying, but very much alive Terrian.

episodes.name: The Boy Who Would Be Terrian King
episodes.overview: Day 104.  The present and future are mixed as Devon tries to save Uly's life.  It is the future and we are in Expansionist Territory.  A man and a rebel Terrian tie off explosives lowered into a generator.

episodes.name: Survival of the Fittest
episodes.overview: Day 117.  Danziger surveys an endless, forbidding vista as he returns to the dunerail where Julia, Morgan and Alonzo are waiting.  There has been a serious direction error but he wants to go on in spite of Devon and Yale's warnings.

episodes.name: All About Eve
episodes.overview: The colonists come upon a crashed Earth re-entry research module. The open the hatch of the 100-year-old craft and find there is still nuclear power.

episodes.name: Natural Born Grendlers
episodes.overview: Four weeks on the plant.  Alonzo in Dreamscape steps from Julia's tent to an open cliff with a huge circular landing pad.  A Terrian pulls him back, and Alonzo awakes in the tent, his leg still injured. Devon talks to Yale about their dwindling food rations while Morgan enjoys a five course meal, courtesy of virtual reality.

episodes.name: Flower Child
episodes.overview: Day 130.  Scouting in all directions, Danziger, Bess and Morgan come upon colorful flower buds which burst open throwing a golden powder in their faces.  The flower pollen carries a sickness that causes them to emit a golden vapor.
